source:
If this option is enabled, the 'custom commission' will be calculated based on residual value of tracked Total Cost less the Maximum Total Cost
example:
'campaign commission' is 30%
'Maximum total cost' is 100
'Commission if over maximum' is 10%
when new sale is created with totalcost $150, commission is computed 30% from $100 + 10% from $50 = $35 (without this checkbox commission is 10% from 150)
translation:
If this option is enabled, the 'custom commission' will be calculated based on residual value of tracked Total Cost less the Maximum Total Cost
example:
'campaign commission' is 30%
'Maximum total cost' is 100
'Commission if over maximum' is 10%
when new sale is created with totalcost $150, commission is computed 30% from $100 + 10% from $50 = $35 (without this checkbox commission is 10% from 150)

source:
The last affiliate tier with no parent in a sale will get the commission as a difference between the totalcost and the sum of commissions given to lower tiers.
Notice: Use this plugin only in case you want to pay all the totalcost (100% commission) to your affiliates.
translation:
The last affiliate tier with no parent in a sale will get the commission as a difference between the totalcost and the sum of commissions given to lower tiers.
Notice: Use this plugin only in case you want to pay all the totalcost (100% commission) to your affiliates.

source:
Example 1:
Let's have the main commission structure set like this: 1st tier 50%; 2nd tier 30% and 3rd tier 20%. Now here are some cases:
  • Commission for all 3 tiers: Every tier gets the commission noramlly (50%, 30%, 20%)
  • Commission for 2 tiers: The 1st tier gets 50% and the 2nd tier gets 'totalcost' - 50%(lower tiers)
  • Commission for 1 tier: The 1st tier gets commission of 'totalcost' - 0(there is no lower tier) = 100%
Example 2:
Let's have the main commission structure set like this: 1st tier 30%; 2nd tier 20% and 3rd tier 10%, for all tiers the commission is 60%. Now here are some cases:
  • Commission for all 3 tiers: Every tier gets the commission noramlly (30%, 20%, 10%)
  • Commission for 2 tiers: The 1st tier gets 30% and the 2nd tier gets 'totalcost' - 30%(lower tiers) = 70%, for all tiers the commission is 100%!
  • Commission for 1 tier: The 1st tier gets commission of 'totalcost' - 0(there is no lower tier), so for all tiers the commission is 100%!
translation:
Example 1:
Let's have the main commission structure set like this: 1st tier 50%; 2nd tier 30% and 3rd tier 20%. Now here are some cases:
  • Commission for all 3 tiers: Every tier gets the commission noramlly (50%, 30%, 20%)
  • Commission for 2 tiers: The 1st tier gets 50% and the 2nd tier gets 'totalcost' - 50%(lower tiers)
  • Commission for 1 tier: The 1st tier gets commission of 'totalcost' - 0(there is no lower tier) = 100%
Example 2:
Let's have the main commission structure set like this: 1st tier 30%; 2nd tier 20% and 3rd tier 10%, for all tiers the commission is 60%. Now here are some cases:
  • Commission for all 3 tiers: Every tier gets the commission noramlly (30%, 20%, 10%)
  • Commission for 2 tiers: The 1st tier gets 30% and the 2nd tier gets 'totalcost' - 30%(lower tiers) = 70%, for all tiers the commission is 100%!
  • Commission for 1 tier: The 1st tier gets commission of 'totalcost' - 0(there is no lower tier), so for all tiers the commission is 100%!

source:
NOTE: If you are unable to activate license online, press "Apply for license key" to send a (standard) 
e-mail to QualityUnit.com to apply for an license key. We will email you license key back as
soon as possible. Put received license key to "License ID" input field to continue installation process.
translation:
NOTE: If you are unable to activate license online, press "Apply for license key" to send a (standard) 
e-mail to QualityUnit.com to apply for an license key. We will email you license key back as
soon as possible. Put received license key to "License ID" input field to continue installation process.

not functioning properly

source:
Create your merchant (admin) account for login to the program.
All the fields below are mandatory. Please remember your username and password, you will need them when you'll want to log in to your merchant panel.
translation:
Create your merchant (admin) account for login to the program.
All the fields below are mandatory. Please remember your username and password, you will need them when you'll want to log in to your merchant panel.

source:
Create database for your PAP installation first and then fill the database access information below.
The database can be usually created in your webhosting control panel. If you have problems with it, contact your webhosting support for the correct database information.
translation:
Create database for your PAP installation first and then fill the database access information below.
The database can be usually created in your webhosting control panel. If you have problems with it, contact your webhosting support for the correct database information.

source:
These are the recommended settings for PHP in order to ensure full compatibility with PAP.
PAP will still operate even if your settings do not match.
translation:
These are the recommended settings for PHP in order to ensure full compatibility with PAP.
PAP will still operate even if your settings do not match.

source:
Below is list of supported variables you can use in your PDF document.
 Variables will be replaced by values related to affiliate, under which is PDF downloaded.
  Meaning of fields data1 - data10 you can customize in menu Configuration -> Affiliate Signup -> tab Fields
translation:
Below is list of supported variables you can use in your PDF document.
 Variables will be replaced by values related to affiliate, under which is PDF downloaded.
  Meaning of fields data1 - data10 you can customize in menu Configuration -> Affiliate Signup -> tab Fields

source:
This campaign is still not saved and not active. 
If you completed the configuration, you can finish it using the button below.
Finization means that the campaign will be save and becomes active in the system.
translation:
This campaign is still not saved and not active. 
If you completed the configuration, you can finish it using the button below.
Finization means that the campaign will be save and becomes active in the system.

source:
Here you can change the names of tracking parameters that are used in affiliate URLs. For example, instead of www.yoursite.com/?a_aid=12345
you can have www.yoursite.com/?ref=12345 or any name of your choice.
Note: If you change parameter names, you should tell your affiliates to change their existing links because old parameter names will not work.
It is recommended to keep default parameter names if you don't have any reason to change it.
translation:
Here you can change the names of tracking parameters that are used in affiliate URLs. For example, instead of www.yoursite.com/?a_aid=12345
you can have www.yoursite.com/?ref=12345 or any name of your choice.
Note: If you change parameter names, you should tell your affiliates to change their existing links because old parameter names will not work.
It is recommended to keep default parameter names if you don't have any reason to change it.

source:
Signup Form design

The design can be divided into several parts. The form itself is displayed using template. Look of the whole page is controlled by theme and it's templates.
translation:
Signup Form design

The design can be divided into several parts. The form itself is displayed using template. Look of the whole page is controlled by theme and it's templates.

source:
First row of graph represents how sale commission is divided between first affiliate, 
    last affiliate and other affiliates.
translation:
First row of graph represents how sale commission is divided between first affiliate, 
    last affiliate and other affiliates.

source:
Second row represents which part of commissions is divided between all 
    affiliates and which part is directyly added to first and last affiliates.
translation:
Second row represents which part of commissions is divided between all 
    affiliates and which part is directyly added to first and last affiliates.

source:
You can see that commission for first(last) affiliate is not just first(last) click 
    bonus but also part of "commissions for others" is added to it.
translation:
You can see that commission for first(last) affiliate is not just first(last) click 
    bonus but also part of "commissions for others" is added to it.

translation: If you want to change commissions rewarding you can set it in Campaign Edit -> Commission Settings -> Sale Edit.

translation: Before continuing with troubleshooting, make sure you performed Clicks tracking and Sale tracking integration and that the tracking codes are on the respective pages.

source: Post Affiliate offers powerful debugging tool that allows you to investigate every step of affiliate software during the tracking process.
translation: Post Affiliate offers powerful debugging tool that allows you to investigate every step of affiliate software during the tracking process.

source:
If you don't see any new lines in the log, it means that the tracking code was not called at all, 
so your JavaScript was probably not on the right place.
translation:
If you don't see any new lines in the log, it means that the tracking code was not called at all, 
so your JavaScript was probably not on the right place.
